thread.title: Russia's suspension to be automatically lifted if no further doping cases - Bach

title: Russia's suspension to be automatically lifted if no further doping cases - Bach
text:
Russia's suspension to be automatically lifted if no further doping cases - Bach 10:18am GMT - 01:20 
IOC President Thomas Bach says that Russia's Olympic status would be restored automatically once it was confirmed there were no other doping violations by Russian athletes ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
IOC President Thomas Bach says that Russia's Olympic status would be restored automatically once it was confirmed there were no other doping violations by Russian athletes Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2CHKkZG
